ref: 3149 kiṁśuka m. ʻ the tree Butea frondosa ʼ MBh., kaiṁ- śuka -- ʻ pertaining to B. frondosa ʼ Suśr. 2. *kēśuka -- . [M. Mayrhofer's assumption, EWA i 206, of a *kīsuka<-> ʻ red tree ʼ (changed by pop. etym. to kiṁ -- śuka -- ) ← Drav. is supported by NIA. forms which have no nasal. H. also has ṭesū m.]
Pa. kiṁsuka -- m. ʻ the tree ʼ;
Pk. kiṁsua -- m. ʻ the tree ʼ, n. ʻ the flower ʼ.
